TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SynchronizationAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.ContextAttribute implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeClientContextSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeServerContextSink
Public Class SynchronizationAttribute Inherits ContextAttribute Implements IContributeClientContextSink, IContributeServerContextSink
type SynchronizationAttribute = class inherit ContextAttribute interface IContributeClientContextSink interface IContributeServerContextSink

summary.span: 为当前上下文和所有共享同一实例的上下文强制一个同步域。

span.span: Enforces a synchronization domain for the current context and all contexts that share the same instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此特性应用于对象，可以共享实例的此属性的所有上下文中执行只有一个线程。When this attribute is applied to an object, only one thread can be executing in all contexts that share an instance of this property. 这是通过参与截获和序列化传入调用的相应上下文的接收器。This is done by contributing sinks that intercept and serialize incoming calls for the respective contexts. 如果该属性标记为重入，然后标注也将被截获。If the property is marked for reentry, then callouts are intercepted too. 标注利用拦截，其他等待线程能够输入的最大吞吐量的同步域。The callout interception allows other waiting threads to enter the synchronization domain for maximal throughput. > [!NOTE] > 有两个类名为`SynchronizationAttribute`： 一个在命名空间，而另一个在命名空间。There are two classes named `SynchronizationAttribute` : one in the namespace, and the other in the namespace. 类仅支持同步调用，并可以仅用于维护的组件。The class supports only synchronous calls, and can be used only with serviced components. (有关服务组件的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5133a620-9c8c-47bd-8e36-130e722fe463)。)支持同步和异步调用，并可以在仅使用上下文绑定对象。(For more information on serviced components, see [[\]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5133a620-9c8c-47bd-8e36-130e722fe463).) The supports both synchronous and asynchronous calls, and can be used only with context bound objects. (有关详细信息上下文绑定对象，请参阅类。)(For more information on context bound objects, see the class.) > [!NOTE] > 此类，可以链接要求并且在类级别继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 一个直接调用方或派生的类不包含基础结构权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将。The following code example demonstrates the use of the . 有关完整示例代码中，请参阅示例类。For the complete example code, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CPP/ad.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CS/ad.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AsyncResult.NewExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/VB/ad.vb#2)]
